title: I have a bet (for lunch) with two friends.  I live off Boones Neck Road in Supply and I heard a train whistle, then I heard the click, clack on the tracks.  Is this possible.  This was around 9am on Tues. 1/17/12 (my birthday).
text:
A map of North Carolina railways shows the closest tracks are at
Sunnypoint Military Ocean Terminal near Southport, near Whiteville and
near Conway in South Carolina. Here's a link to the map:
http://www.bytrain.org/docs/RailMapMar2011_Web.pdf
